Welcome to the Gati Lab!

We are part of the Biosciences Division at SLAC National Laboratory..

Research in the lab is focused on the structural biology of important membrane proteins, mainly by single particle cryoEM.

Contact Us

Panofsky Fellow, Group leader
Biosciences Division, SLAC National Lab
Department of Structural Biology, School of Medicine, Stanford University
